sentences.sContent: She carried on mopping the floor.
It was so hot he had to keep stopping to mop his face.
sentences.sCn: 天气太热，他只得不时停下来擦一擦脸。

synos.tran: 用拖把擦洗地板；扮鬼脸

remMethod.val: 著名论坛猫扑的英文就是mop

trans.tranOther: a thing used for washing floors, consisting of a long stick with threads of thick string or a piece of  sponge  fastened to one end

trans.tranCn: 用拖把拖；擦；用拖把拖；擦
trans.tranOther: to wash a floor with a wet mop
